attributes.action: Upload every episode of EastEnders from 1985 onwards onto BBC iPlayer
attributes.background: BBC was adding every episode of EastEnders to iPlayer, 2008 onwards. They started adding 4 episodes a week, and then started to add a year monthly. We're grateful for this, however we want OLD episodes. Janine pushing Barry off a cliff, Frank running Tiff over, Sonias tuba arc. All of them!!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the programmes availible on iPlayer are a matter for the BBC, not the UK Government or Parliament.
